Detailed Description

A method of reading images, with a specific kind of compression.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ImageReader::open ( const std::string &  name) [pure virtual]

Opens a file for reading and starts decompressing it. Must be called before get_parameters.

Implemented in JPEGReader, and TIFFReader.
